name: Time Escape: A Prototype
description:
Jump into a new experience and kick away the day! TE:AP offers simple mechanics of jumping over obstacles, with the ability to kick smaller ones. Simple mechanics aside, TE:AP provides additional single-player features including: twitch integration (with an offline mode), in-game cheat codes, achievements, and character customization.

Twitch Integration: Connect in-game to your Twitch chat and let your viewers interact with your game! Options include spawning obstacles or health, blocking your jump input, and even resetting your account! The Integration has an available Offline feature, in case you happen to have no internet, or otherwise want a bit of an extra challenge.

Cheat Codes: Main menu cheat code input system, allowing players to obtain all characters colors, unlock all difficulties, and more!

Achievements: One-off and interval achievements provide goals to meet, with achievement data persisted through save resets.

Character Customization: Collect coins in game to purchase colors for your character's clothes and hair!
